mapper.sql: id, `name`, chief_id, member_count, qq_group, slogan, avatar_url, official_state, `type`, grade, create_at
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.PASSWORD, u.nickname, u.avatar_url, u.major, u.email, u.phone, u.slogan, u.login_question, u.login_answer, u.is_admin FROM cms_user_club_rel r, sys_user u WHERE r.club_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND r.user_id=u.id

SELECT
FROM cms_club WHERE delete_status = 0 LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT club.id, club.name, club.chief_id, u.nickname, club.avatar_url FROM cms_club club, sys_user u WHERE club.chief_id = u.id
SELECT club.id, club.name, club.chief_id, u.nickname, club.avatar_url FROM cms_club club, sys_user u WHERE club.chief_id = u.id AND club.name LIKE concat("%",#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")

SELECT club.id, club.name, club.chief_id, u.nickname, club.avatar_url, club.slogan, club.member_count, club.qq_group FROM cms_club club, sys_user u WHERE club.chief_id = u.id AND club.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT club.id, club.name, club.chief_id, u.nickname, club.avatar_url FROM cms_club club, sys_user u WHERE club.chief_id = u.id AND club.id IN ( SELECT club_id FROM sys_user_role_rel WHERE role_id = 2 AND user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

SELECT club.id, club.name, club.chief_id, u.nickname, club.avatar_url FROM cms_club club, sys_user u WHERE club.chief_id = u.id AND club.id IN ( SELECT club_id FROM sys_user_role_rel WHERE role_id = 3 AND user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
